Pánfilo requests the loan to purchase compost, fertilizer, etc., so he can maintain his crop and be able to offer his customers high quality produce. His plan for the future is to buy land in order to expand his crop.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: María Esther

texts.es:
Doña Maria, es una comerciante de frutas, verduras y granos básicos, su actividad comercial tiene aproximadamente 5 años de estar funcionando.

Es importante mencionar que ella antes se dedicaba a la agricultura con la ayuda de sus hijos, y con las ventas realizadas los ahorraba, se le presento la oportunidad de comprar un local en el mercado  para poner su propio negocio que tanto soñaba.

María ofrece atención amable a sus clientes, ya que aprecia su trabajo.

Ella es madre soltera, y tiene cuatro hijos a su cargo, con tres de ellos en edad escolar, Necesita la oportunidad de que se el pueda brindar un financiamiento para invertir y mejorar su negocio y así  incrementar su inventario, el crédito lo solicita para compra de granos básicos: frijoles, manteniendo disponibles para su debida comercialización.
texts.en:
Maria is a merchant who sells fruits, vegetables and staple grains.  She's had this business up and running for about 5 years.

It's important to mention that prior to this she worked in agriculture with the help of her children.  With her savings from this activity, she had the opportunity to buy a stall in the market and have the business that she had always dreamed of.

Maria provides friendly service to her customers, because she appreciates having her job.

Maria is a single mother who has 4 children in her care.  Three of her children are school-aged.  She needs this opportunity that she is being provided to invest in her business and improve it.  She is requesting a loan to increase her inventory by purchasing staple grains and beans so that she can have an appropriate amount of goods available to sell.

loans.use: to buy staple grains and beans

loans.name: Ana Griselda

texts.es:
doña Ana tiene un negocio de taller de costura, negocio ubicado en su casa de habitación, oficio que lo aprendió desde muy joven, sin embargo para tener un mejor conocimiento técnico aprobó un curso de sastrería.
Tiene dos maquinas de coser, una eléctrica y una manual.

En vista que su trabajo es de calidad, su demanda ha crecido, por lo que en estos momentos necesita capital de trabajo para comprar telas al por mayor, con el objetivo de disminuir los costos, y tener telas disponible para la fabricación de ropa variada.

Es una persona emprendedora, decidió poner su propio negocio por la difícil situación económica del país y de esta forma contribuir con los gastos del hogar y apoyar a su esposo.

Su estado civil es casado y tiene una hija en edad escolar.
texts.en:
Ana has a sewing workshop.  Her business is located in her home and she learned the trade when she was very young.  In order to gain greater technical expertise, she sat and passed a tailoring course.   She has two sewing machines: one electric and one manual.

Ana produces good-quality work and her demand has grown so she currently needs working capital to buy fabric wholesale with the aim of reducing her costs and having fabric available to make a variety of clothing.

Ana is an entrepreneurial person.  She decided to set up her own business owing to the difficult financial situation in her country.  It is how she contributes toward her household expenses and supports her husband.

Ana is married and she has a school-age daughter.

loans.use: to buy fabric, zippers, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is from Maquilao, Tagub City. She is 44 years old, married and has two children. 

To make a living, Lorna sells fish while her husband does fishing. Lorna has been engaged in fish vending for five years and gets 5,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2008, Lorna joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets.

loans.name: Marlon

texts.es:
El señor Marlon es propietario de un taller de carpintería, negocio que aprendió desde muy joven con el apoyo económico de su padre.


Su especialidad es la producción de roperos de tres cuerpos, de los cuales los comercializa en los mercados populares de Managua, y algunas ciudades importantes del país, su trabajo es de calidad y con una gran aceptación por el diseño.


Actualmente su demanda de roperos ha crecido en estos últimos meses, por lo que necesita de mayor capital de trabajo para adquirir madera, materia prima indispensable, por lo que solicita a ceprodel un crédito para la compra de Madera; esto con el objetivo de comprar volumen de materiales a un menor precio.


Es una persona que tiene un gran potencial de desarrollo y está pensando en producir muebles y poner un establecimiento en uno de los mercados más importantes de Managua.
texts.en:
Marlon is the owner of a carpentry shop, a business that he learned from a young age with the financial support and help of his father.

His specialty is the production of wardrobes with three sections, which he sells in the popular markets in Managua and other significant cities in the country.  His work is of good quality, and his designs are well received.

Currently, the demand for wardrobes has grown over the past few months, so he needs more working capital to acquire raw wood, an indispensable basic material.  Therefore, he is asking CEPRODEL for a loan to buy wood, with the objective of buying a greater volume of materials at a lower price.

He is a person with great potential for development, and he is thinking of making other furniture and putting a permanent storefront in one of the most important markets in Managua.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products from Avon to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Dorina

texts.en:
Dorina is 37 years old. She is married with six children. Dorina is from Carmen Annex, Ozamis City. 

Dorina is operating a specialized general store, selling a variety of food products in the local community. She has been in this business for ten years and earns 9,000 PHP a month.  

In 2007, Dorina joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 23,500 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cloth for making blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods for her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials needed for manicures and pedicures.

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en:
Maureen is from Maquilao, Tangub City. She is 29 years old, married and has one child. 

To make a living, Maureen owns and operates a general store. She has been in her business for seven years and earns 5,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2009, Maureen joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 14,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (malted milk), shampoo, soaps, etc. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Adonia Walter

texts.es:
el señor Adonia Walter esta soltero, tiene 31 años de edad, curso los grados de educacion diversificada, graduado como administrador, se dedica al comercio a la venta de medicina popular, inicio este negocio vendiendo de casa en casa, y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia. 

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de medicamento, analgésicos, jarabes, tabletas, ampollas, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande y surtido, y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Adonia Walter is single and 31 years old.  He finished his studies through the end of high school and received his diploma in Business Administration.  he is in the business of selling popular medicinal remedies, a business he began through door-to-door sales, and as of this moment, he has four years of experience.

His is asking for this loan to buy a variety of medicines, analgesics, syrups, tablets, ampoules, etc.  He hopes in the future to have a large business and stock it well and improve his earnings.

loans.use: to buy medicines for the store.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
Con la confianza de poder alcanzar sus sueños se formó un comité con 13 señoras humildes con el propósito de seguir trabajando por sus familias. Ellas quieren una superación personal y laboral.
Sonia, la presidenta, se dedica a la elaboración de comestibles de todo tipo, y está saliendo adelante gracias a su trabajo. Ella es una persona con sueños, por los cuales lucha y se esfuerza día a día. Este crédito quiere invertirlo en insumos para poder seguir haciendo las comidas que vende, como ser carnes, condimentos y demás insumos.
texts.en:
With the confidence of being able to achieve all their dreams, they formed a committee of 13 humble women wanting to continue working for their families' wellbeing.  They want to find success personally and in their businesses.

Sonia, the president, makes foods of all different types, and she is getting ahead, thanks to her work.  She is a person with big dreams, for which she fights and put effort into her work every day.  This loan is one she hopes to invest to keep making the food that she sells, like by buying meats, condiments, and other comestibles.

loans.use: to buy meats, condiments, and other eatable products.

loans.name: Sobir

texts.ru: У него трудное условия жизни и низкий доход, но доброе сердце и хороший нрав. Он -Собир из Таджикистана, которому 52 года, женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Более 23 года он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картофель, пшеницу, морковь и т.п. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Так как у него высококачественный урожай, так и его товары имеют большой спрос. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает займ, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и семена. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
He lives in harsh conditions and has a low income, but boasts a good heart and a good-natured temper. He is Sobir -- a 52-year-old married man from Tajikistan with two children. For more than 23 years he's made a living by growing crops like potatoes, wheat, carrots and so forth. His goods are high-quality and in high demand and that enables him to sell his harvests on the market for a profit. His wife helps with running the business.

Expanding his business will enable him to fulfill more of his family's needs but for that he needs to reap bigger harvests. He's asking for a loan in order to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers. He's waiting and hoping for your help.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Paulo Nicolas

texts.es:
El señor Paulo Nicolas esta soltero, tiene 33 años de edad, cursó los grados de educación primaria, se dedica a la carpintería, la producción de muebles, inicio este negocio siendo operario y hasta el momento lleva 11 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo, que lo utilizara para la compra de madera, pino blanco, cedros, barniz, pintura, etc.  Ya que quiere que su negocio tenga mas muebles y por eso va tener mas clientes que le compren, espera seguir mejorando y apoyando a su familia.
texts.en:
Paulo Nicolas is single. He is 33 years old and completed his 'educación primaria' (education for children aged between 7 and 14).  He is a carpenter and makes furniture.  He started in this business as a worker and now has 11 years experience.  

Paulo Nicolas is requesting a loan which he will use to buy wood, white pine, cedar, varnish, paints, etc. as he would like his business to have more furniture which will mean more customers will buy from him.  He hopes to continue improving and supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам родился 1992 года. Он очень умный и способный молодой человек. После окончания школы он поступил в Таджикский Технологический Государственный Университет. Данное время он является студентом 2 курса. Отец Рустама погиб несеолько лет назад, а мать работает в организации и получает 750 сомони. Сестра и брат Рустама тоже работают, но его семья не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в этом году. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте вместе поможем молодому специалисту окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en:
Rustam was born in 1992. He's a very smart and capable young man. After finishing school, he was accepted by the Tajikistan National Technological University. He's now a second-year student. Rustam's father died several years ago and his mother works for a monthly salary of 750 somoni. Both his brother and sister also work, but they're still unable to pay for his tuition this year.
Therefore, he's asking for a loan to cover his tuition costs. He's waiting for your assistance. Lets help this young man finish his education and allow him to implement his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition.

loans.name: La Alegria Group

texts.es:
El comité “La Alegría” es de la ciudad de Santaní, las miembros son amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, y se han unido con el propósito de ir mejorando en sus trabajos y así también ayudar a sus familias.
Teresa, una de las miembros, se dedica a la cría de animales, como ser gallinas, patos, cabras y demás. Tiene una buena cantidad de animales, los cuales una vez grandes faena o vende, y de esa forma ayuda a su familia. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que desea salir adelante y progresar.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de granos, balanceados y demás alimentos para sus animales.
texts.en:
The communal bank "La Alegria" is from the city of  Santaní.  The members are friends and neighbors from this city.  They got together with the goal of improving their businesses and also helping their families.

Teresa, one of the members, has a business raising animals such as hens, ducks, goats and other animals.  She has a good quantity of animals, and when they get big she slaughters them or sells them.  This is how she helps her family.  Teresa is a very hardworking woman who wants to get ahead and make progress.

Teresa is requesting this loan to buy grains, nutritionally balanced feed, and other products to feed her animals.

loans.use: to buy grains and other animal feed

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
El comité “Santa Lucía” tiene 10 miembros muy trabajadoras, que se unieron para ayudarse las unas a las otras. Todas son mujeres de campo, que quieren ayudar a sus familias por medio de su trabajo.
Todas se dedican a la cría de animales de corral, y saben que es un trabajo muy duro, pero quieren hacerlo por sus hijos y familiares, pues ellas pasaron por muchas necesidades que no quieren que sus familias pasen.
Tomasa, la presidenta, solicita de este crédito para la compra de balanceados para sus animales, ya que tiene varios y quiere alimentarlos bien.
texts.en:
The “Santa Lucía” committee has 10 very hard-working members who joined together in order to help each other out.  They are all country women who would like to help their families through their work.  They all raise farmyard animals and, although they know that it is very hard work, they want to do it for the sake of their children and family members.  They have all experienced a lot of hardships in life that they do not want their families to have to experience.

Tomasa, the group president, is requesting this loan to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her animals as she has a number of animals and would like to feed them well.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced animal feed

loans.name: Unidas Por El Progreso Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Irma es la presidenta del grupo Unidas por el progreso, comenta que su grupo está saliendo adelante gracias al trabajo que todas ellas hacen, ya que tienen un gran entusiasmo y ganas de salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias.
Irma tiene una despensa bien surtida con todo tipo de productos,  y cuenta que empezó con un pequeño negocio, pero que gracias a su trabajo esta creciendo y cada vez va mejorando mas. Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar algunos insumos para su negocio, como ser bebidas y comestibles, y así seguir dando buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Irma is the president of the 'Unidas por el progreso' group.  She says that her group is doing well thanks to the work that they all do.  They are all really keen and have a desire to do well and help their families.  Irma has a well-stocked store where she sells all kinds of products.  She says that she started out with a small business but, thanks to all her hard work, the business is growing and continues to improve.

Irma is requesting this loan to buy some supplies for her business such as drinks and food products.  This will allow her to continue providing her customers with a good variety of products.

loans.use: to buy drinks and food products

loans.name: Santa Rita Group

texts.es:
El Comité SANTA RITA esta ubicado en la ciudad de Villa Hayes del Chaco, estan en el tercer ciclo, y trabajan por salir adelante e ir pasando bien todos los ciclos del programa.
La  Sra Maria Elena, la presidenta del grupo se dedica a la venta de frutas de estación, y comenta que gracias a los buenos productos que siempre tiene está teniendo cada vez mejor venta. Ella es una persona con mucho entusiasmo y ganas de salir adelante e ir creciendo con su negocio. Se unió a este grupo con el propósito de mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de frutas para poder venderlas y así tener un mayor ingreso que dar a su familia y también poder invertir en su negocio.
texts.en:
The committee of Santa Rita is located in the city of Villa Hayes del Chaco, and they are in their third loan cycle, working to get ahead and have been doing well in all of their previous cycles.

Maria Elena, the president of the group, works selling seasonal fruits, and she says that thanks to the good products that she always has, she is making better and better sales.  She is a very enthusiastic person and has a great deal of will to succeed and grow her business.  She joined this group with the intention of improving the lives of herself and her family.

She is asking for this loan to buy fruits to sell them and make more profits to sustain her family, and also to be able to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viand

loans.name: Yaguaron Poty Group

texts.es:
El  comité lleva por nombre Yaguarón Poty, se encuentra conformado por 16 mujeres. Ellas se comprometen a trabajar juntas por la unión del grupo y a ayudarse las unas a las otras, están ya actualmente en su ciclo numero 5.
Juliana la presidenta, comenta que siempre trata de apoyar a sus amigas a trabajar y a que no se desanimen. Ella por su parte vende comestibles de todo tipo, como ser empanadas, hamburguesas, sándwich y demás. Cuenta que tiene buena clientela, ya que sus comidas son muy ricas.
Solicita de este crédito para surtirse con insumos para pode seguir haciendo los comestibles que vende.
texts.en:
This committee is called Yaguarón Poty and it has 16 female members.  The women pledge to work together for the unity of the group and to help each other out.  They are currently on their fifth loan cycle.

Juliana, the group president, says that she always tries to support her friends in their work and ensure that they don't lose heart.  Juliana's business is selling all kinds of food such as empanadas, burgers, sandwiches, etc.  She says that she has a good customer base as her meals are really delicious.  She is requesting this loan to stock up with supplies so that she can continue making food to sell.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as meat, condiments, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Nuclear Group

texts.es:
El comité “Nuclear” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Son mujeres jefas de familia, que se unen con las ganas de trabajar juntas e invertir en el trabajo de cada una.
Ludis, una de las integrantes, tiene una despensa en su casa, trabaja desde muy temprano todos los días, ya que va a buscar productos frescos para poder ofrecer a sus clientes. Su meta es poder seguir agrandando su negocio y ayudar por medio de sus ingresos a sus familias.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de verduras, frutas, fideos, arroz, azúcar y demás productos para poder surtir su despensa.
texts.en:
Nuclear Group was formed through the joining together of various neighbours living in the town of Santaní. They are women heads of households who have come together because they want to work with one another and invest in the work of each member. 
Ludis, one of the members, has a store in her home. She starts work early in the morning every day, going out to find fresh products to offer to her customers. Her aim is to continue expanding her business and use her earnings to help her family members.
She is requesting the loan in order to buy fruits, vegetables, pasta, rice, sugar and other foodstuffs with which to stock her shop.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, pasta, rice, sugar and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: Chore Poty Group

texts.es:
El comité “Chore Poty” está mejorando cada vez más, y lo demuestra por medio del trabajo de sus miembros, son personas muy activas con grandes ganas de ir mejorando en lo que hacen y así dar a sus familias lo que necesitan.
Juana es parte de este grupo y cuenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de dulces, es una persona muy trabajadora y que lucha por su familia. También ayuda en lo que puede a sus compañeras, ya que sabe que ellas harían lo mismo si ella necesitase.
Juana solicita de este crédito para la compra de dulces para la venta, y así podrá seguir trabajando y teniendo los medios que necesita para poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The "Chore Poty" communal bank is increasingly making progress, and the members' work is proof of that. They're very active people with a great deal of drive to improve their businesses and therefore provide their families with what they need.
Juana is part of this group and she reports that she sells all types of candy. She's a very hardworking person who strives for her family's sake. She also helps her fellow members in any way she can, since she knows that they would do the same for her if she needed it.
Juana requests this loan in order to purchase candy for selling. That way she'll be able to keep on working and getting the necessary means to continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to purchase candy for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Jeriah

texts.en:
Jeriah, a 49-year-old married mother of four children ranging from 10 to 26 years of age, describes herself as a hardworking and caring woman. For three years now she has been operating a tailoring business that sells dresses, second-hand clothes and clothing materials. Jeriah's enterprise is located within a residential area and near schools; the low purchasing power of some of her customers is her biggest business challenge. Additionally, she sells bananas to local residents and schools, which increases her income.

Having received two previous loans of Kes 20,000 and 50,000, both since repaid, Jeriah will use this Kes 50,000 loan to buy clothing materials to make more dresses to sell during the December holiday season when she anticipates demand will be high. Her business goal is to improve her enterprise within five years, and she hopes to build a house for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy clothing materials for her business.

loans.name: Pablita

texts.en: Pablita is a single woman. She is 60 years old and lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. Pablita owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting rice for sale to earn a living. She has been doing this for 7 years and earns PHP 8,000 each month. Pablita has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase fertilizer. She has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for almost a year. Pablita dreams of business expansion one day.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more coconuts to resell

loans.name: Honorine's Group

texts.fr: IL s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Agée de 41ans, Honorine la responsable est mariée et mère de deux enfants scolarisés. Le plus âgé a 15ans et le moins âgé a 10ans. Elle vend des produits maréchaires depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un appui financier à Finadev. Le bénéfice dégagé de cet appui financier lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et d'acquérir une parcelle. Honorine se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en:
This is a two person group, and Honorine is the group representative. She is 41 years old, married, and has two children who go to school. Her oldest child is 15 and her youngest is 10. 

For several years, she has been selling garden vegetables. She buys her supplies at one of the markets in Benin. In order to strengthen her business and satisfy her clients' demands, she has asked for and received financial support from Finadev. The income from this loan will help her participate in her children's education and buy a plot of land. 

Honorine is pictured at left.

loans.use: to buy two bags of potatoes and two bags of carrots.

loans.name: Joayhu Group

texts.es:
El comité de Mujeres"Joayhu " es de la zona de San Ignacio, todas las integrantes son amigas y vecinas de barrio. El objetivo de cada de una de ella es emprender y trabajar juntas.
Las Sra. Carolina es lavandera, y cuenta que siempre tiene mucho trabajo que hacer, y que por medio de la lavandería ha podido dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna. Es muy luchadora y sacrificada por su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de jabones, suavizantes, aromatizantes y demás insumos que necesita para poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The "Joayhu" communal bank is comprised of women from the San Ignacio area. All the members are friends and neighbors from the neighborhood. Their goal is to start businesses and work together.
Carolina is a laundress and she reports that she has always had a great deal of work to do. She also reports that through her laundry business she has been able to provide her family with everything they need in order to live a decent life. She's very hardworking and makes sacrifices for her family.
She requests this loan in order to purchase soap, softener, fabric freshener and other supplies she needs so that she can keep on working.

loans.use: to purchase soap, softener, fabric freshener and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making stew

loans.name: Babie Rose

texts.en: Babie Rose is 41 years old and single. She lives in Carmen Annex, Ozamis City. Babie Rose owns and operates a general store. She has operated her business for 5 years and earns 9,000 PHP a month from this activity. In 2008, she joined GDMPC. Babie Rose is requesting a loan of 18,500 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a 53 year old single woman. She has 3 children who range in age from 19 to 32 years old. She describes herself as focused and dedicated to her work. She operates a retail tailor business where she sells clothes and provides repair to worn out clothes. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located within a residential area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of sufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy fabric and embroidery materials to make clothes to sell. Her business goal is to open a new retail shop within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will improve the living standard of her family . This is her fifth loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy fabric and embroidery materials

loans.name: Arsenio

texts.en: Arsenio is a 63-year-old married man from San Miguel, Bohol. He is the father of two grown-up children. Arsenio buys bananas, cassava, vegetables and yams that he resells at the market. Arsenio works hard to increase his earnings. He is asking for a loan to buy more fruits and vegetable to sell at the market. With this, he will be able to increase his sales and then his profit.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell in the market

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is from Sta. Cruz, Ozamis City. She is 54 years old. Marilou is married and has three children. To make a living, Marilou runs a transportation service business. Marilou has been in her business for 12 years and earns 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month. 

In 2011, Marilou joined GDMPC. Marilou is requesting a loan of 6,500 PHP which will be used to repair a transport vehicle used in her business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pig feed

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a donkey cart for her delivery business

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El Comité Kuña Katupyry, desde sus inicios mostró muchas ganas de progresar y salir adelante, son 16 las mujeres las que lo forman, y cada una de ella es una persona con ganas de progresar e ir mejorando en sus actividades.
La Presidenta del Grupo es la Sra. Hilaria, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños,  esta casada, tiene 4 hijos por quienes lucha día a día para darles una vida digna a su familia. Es una señora muy activa y responsable. Solicita de esta ayuda para la compra de variadas prendas para todo género, y así estar bien surtida y ofrecer buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
From the very beginning, the "Kuña Katupyry" communal bank has shown a great deal of drive to make progress and get ahead. It is comprised of 16 women and each and every one of them is a person determined to make progress and continuously improve her business.
The communal bank's president is Hilaria. She sells women's, men's and children's clothing. She's married and has four children for whom she strives on a daily basis so that she can provide her family with a decent life. She's a very active and responsible lady. She requests this help in order to purchase various kinds of garments for every gender. That way she'll stock up and offer a wide range of products to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase all kinds of garments for selling.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en: Gemma, 38 years old, is from Gango, Ozmaiz City. She is married and has 5 children. Gemma provides general clothing services to local community members. She has been engaged in her business for 6 years, earning 5,000 PHP monthly. In 2007, Gemma joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional equipment and supplies such as needles and thread. Gemma plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment and supplies such as needles and thread

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es:
El Comite Amistad  es del Chaco, esta en su primer ciclo, y quieren ir avanzando dentro del programa, conociéndose y ayudándose por medio del trabajo de todas ellas. Son mujeres muy trabajadoras y entusiastas.
Un ejemplo de lucha es Graciela, la presidenta, quien desde muy tempranas horas ya trabaja en su venta de carbón, le va bien ya que se usa mucho el carbón ya que es más barato que el gas. Está sacando adelante a su familia y está contenta con lo que hace, pero quiere seguir creciendo. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar más carbón y tener en stock, para que no le falte para cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The "Comite Amistad" is from Chaco and they are in their first cycle of loans and want to advance themselves in this program by getting to know each other better and helping each other through everyone's hard work.  They are very hardworking and enthusiastic women.

One example in this struggle is Graciela, the president of the group, who works from the very early morning selling charcoal, which is doing very well because many people use charcoal, since it's a lot cheaper than propane.  She is helping her family to get ahead and she feels satisfied by what she has done, but wants to continue growing her business.  She is asking for this loan to buy more charcoal and have it in stock so that she doesn't run out and fail to deliver what her customers need.

loans.use: to buy charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Mujeres En Progreso Group

texts.es:
“Mujeres en progreso” está en su décimo ciclo, tiene 19 miembros, donde cada una tiene su propio emprendimientos, pero siempre que se necesiten se ayudan a las otras, y ese es el secreto de estas mujeres, pues siempre se apoyan y así es más fácil superar todo.
La  Sra. Mirna se dedica a la  venta de ropas y con ello ayuda a su familia a generar ingresos y elevar su calidad de vida. Tiene buena venta ya que ella es muy buena vendedora, y sumado a ello siempre tiene buenos productos que ofrece a sus clientes.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, con los que va a seguir dando variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
“Mujeres en progreso” is in its 10th loan cycle. It is comprised of 19 members and each one of them has her own business. However, their secret is that whenever they're in need, they help each other out. They always support each other and that way it's easier to overcome anything.
Mirna sells clothing and this way she helps her family to get an income and improve their living conditions. Her sales are high because she's a very good salesperson, and additionally, she always has good products to offer her customers.
She requests the loan in order to purchase clothing so that she can keep on providing her customers with a wide range of products.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Mrema

texts.en:
Mrema, 44, is a very responsible man, who is dedicated to maintaining the welfare of his family. He has a wife and five children, and he lives with them. Mrema has a business operating a pub. He has been in this business for the last three years, and it is a business that has given him good results. This is his third loan cycle with Yehu, and he is grateful for the support they are giving him.

Mrema is requesting a loan to be able to buy crates of sodas and beer. He also plans to buy a flat screen television to provide entertainment, so as to woo more customers.

loans.use: to buy crates of soda, beer, and a flat screen television.

loans.name: Virgen De Caacupé Poty Group

texts.es:
El Comité Virgen de Caacupé Poty, se formo en la Ciudad de Caaguazú, actualmente estan en el Primer ciclo, este grupo se formo con señoras con  ganas de salir adelante con la ayuda que  les da Fundación Paraguaya, ellas cuentan con trabajos propios y luchan  día a día para ganar un poco de dinero para mantener a la familia.
La Presidenta es Eustacia una madre luchadora que tiene un pequeño negocio de consumo familiar., Una panadería que es manejada por ella y su marido. Ella es muy Activa y responsable. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de harina, levadura, azúcar, sal, manteca y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo los panificados que vende y seguir ofreciendo buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee "Virgen de Caacupé Poty" was started in the city for Caaguazú and they are currently in their first cycle of loans.  This group was started with women who were motivated to get ahead, and with the help they have been given by the Fundación Paraguaya, they all have their own businesses and fight every day to make a bit of money to maintain their families in good stead.

The president of the organization is Eustacia a struggling mother who has a small business selling daily necessities.  It is a bakery, which is run by her and her husband.  She is very energetic and responsible.  She is asking for this loan in order to buy flour, yeast, sugar, salt, butter, and other ingredients to continue making the breads that she sells and continue offering a variety of goods to her customers.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, sugar, salt, butter, and other materials.

loans.name: Lamara

texts.en: Lamara is 58 years old, from a small village of Gardabani district. She lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Lamara and her husband are provided with a retirement pension. Her son works as a welder and gets monthly income. The family runs a livestock farming business. In particular, they have a milk cow and 3 calves, whose milk is used in dairy products. Besides, she has hens and sells eggs with yogurt locally in an open market at a good price. Lamara requested a loan for purchasing a milk cow. After purchasing an additional milk cow, she will produce and sell more dairy products and will expand her business. It will significantly increase the income of the family. With increased income they will improve their living conditions. Lamara awaits your support

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy additional goods to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials needed in the beauty salon

loans.name: Doljinsuren

texts.en:
Mrs.Doljinsuren, 32 years old, lives with her husband and son in a small house in the Huvsgul province of Mongolia. Her husband, Burenbat, 37, drives a taxi. Doljinsuren's son, Altangerel, 15, is a secondary school student.

Doljinsuren has been managing an organic vegetable sales business for years at a rental counter in the local market. She has built a strong customer and supplier base. Doljinsuren is a responsible, friendly and hardworking woman who says, "I and my husband work hard for my son to be grown highly educated and let him be able to build his own brighter future for himself". She is planning to reserve a large amount of organic vegetables for the winter and she needs a 3,500,000 MNT loan to help her with this purchase.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of organic vegetables to sell during the winter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy leather for making shoes

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en: Susanna runs her own clothing and shoe sales business, but now sells men’s clothing and shoes as well, which allows her to attract more customers. Thanks to her business, Susanna provides for her family. She used her previous Kiva loan to buy summer clothes and shoes to resell. Susanna is asking for her second Kiva loan of 600,000 AMD to buy winter jackets, jumpers and boots for her business.

loans.use: to buy winter jackets, jumpers and boots

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Chiguba

texts.en:
Chiguba is a 27-year-old, divorced man, with no children. He lives in the Mnagoni area, in the outskirts of Samburu. Three years ago, he began selling everyday consumer products of many kinds. 

With this loan of 50,000 KES that he is requesting from Yehu, Chiguba  wants to grow his business by restocking it with more products. He plans to buy basic grains, salt, coffee, soap, detergent, eggs, sugar, soft drinks, snacks, condiments, medicines, and other products. His goal is to have a bigger shop in future. This will enable him to provide better service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, medicines, snacks, detergent and other consumer products

loans.name: Perpetuo Socorro Group

texts.es:
El Comité Perpetuo Socorro actualmente esta en el 15º ciclo son señoras con aspiraciones y deseos de trabajar, habitualmente todas se dedican a la artesanía y con el incentivo de generar ingresos para una buena calidad de vida, comentan que gracias a la ayuda de la fundación han crecido mucho y que han ayudado mucho a sus familias.
La Sra. Leonarda se dedica a la artesanía, borda todo tipo de prendas y tejidos, es una persona con gran habilidad y destreza, está sacando adelante a su familia por medio de su esfuerzo y su sacrificio. Comenta que su grupo también creció mucho y que sus compañeras también han mejorado mucho y están saliendo adelante. Ellas quieren seguir creciendo y ayudando a sus familias.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de hilos, batidores, agujas y demás.
texts.en:
The committee "Perpetuo Socorro" is currently in their 15th loan cycle.  They are women with aspirations and a desire to work, and all of them are in crafts in order to earn an income for the betterment of their lifestyles.  They says that thanks to the help of the foundation, they have been able to grow their businesses and it has really helped out their families.

Leonarda works in crafting, and she embroiders all different kinds of garments and textiles.  She is a person with great talent and dexterity, and she is improving her family's life through her hard work and sacrifice.  She notes that her group has also grown a lot and that her companions have also improved a lot and are moving forward in life.  They want to continue growing and helping their families.

She is asking for this loan to buy threads, frames, needles, and more.

loans.use: to buy thread, frames, and more.

loans.name: Alejandrino

texts.es:
El Sr. Alejandrino tiene 58 años, está casado con la Sra. María hace ya 30 años, del matrimonio nacieron 2 hijos, viven en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo hace 28 años.
El Sr. Alejandrino  es comerciante hace 14 años, tiene un puesto en el Mercado, donde tiene venta de Frutas, Verduras y bazar,  bien surtida con clientela formada. Comenta que comenzó con algo pequeño cuando sus hijos aun eran bebés y la economía ya era difícil. Se levantan muy temprano para abrir su local y comprar los productos frescos y así ofrecer buena calidad a todos sus clientes. 
Hoy solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras, para poder seguir dando buena variedad a sus clientes, y así seguir dando a sus hijos lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Alejandrino is 58 years old. He has been married to María for 30 years, and they have two children. They have lived in the city of Coronel Oviedo for 28 years. 

Alejandrino has been a vendor for 14 years. He has a stall in the market where he sells fruits, vegetables, and novelty items. His shop is well-stocked and he has an established customer base. He says that he started small when his children were babies and the economy was unfavorable. They get up very early to open their stall and to buy fresh produce so that they can offer good quality to all their customers.

Today he is requesting a loan to buy fruits and vegetables so that he can continue to offer his customers a good variety and to give them what they need.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Ashrafdjon

texts.ru: Ашрафджону 35 лет, он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Дети не совершеннолетние. Они учатся в средней школе и всегда просят родителей отремонтировать их дом, но его доход от услуги такси не достаточно для этого. Он должен заменить отремонтировать все имеющиеся комнаты и таким образом обеспечить  теплоту зимой, так как в Таджикистане зима довольно холодная. Из-за не удобства дома, у детей всегда насморк зимой. Ашрафджон запрашивает займ на сумму 3000  сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Ашрафджон и его дети будут ждать, пока добрые кредиторы помогут им решить проблему жилья.
texts.en:
Ashrafjon is 35 and married with 3 minor children. His children are in middle school and are always asking their parents to repair their house, but Ashrafjon's income does not allow it. He should repair all the rooms to ensure sufficient heat insulation in the winter as winters can be fairly cold in Tajikistan. Due to poor insulation, his children are always getting colds in the winter.
Ashrafjon is requesting a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy building materials. Ashrafjon and his children are anxiously waiting for the lenders to help them solve their housing problem.

loans.use: to buy building materials for repairing his house

loans.name: Kosta

texts.en:
Kosta, a 52-year-old, has been married for long time; yet no children. He is an Egyptian and lives with his wife in southeastern Albania. They have fully been integrated into the society. For the past eight years, he has had a business transporting people and has been making enough money to feed both of them and make a living. 

The desire to have a child of their own is strong for this couple, and Kosta has tried different treatments in the past with savings from his business. They have recently been referred for another treatment that looks more promising. They don’t want to lose this opportunity, but just try it. This is why he is requesting a loan and hopes that with lenders' financial help, both of their prayers, and his proper treatment, their dream will become reality.

loans.use: to cover the cost of infertility treatments for him

loans.name: Dato

texts.en:
Dato is from Abasha district of West Georgia. He is 41 years old and lives with his wife, their 20-year-old son, and his sister. His son works as an artisan locally and gets a monthly income. The family is involved in agricultural business. In particular, Dato runs a small dairy farm of five milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. The family sells, on average, 40 kg of cheese per month. In addition, Dato owns two pigs and sells piglets seasonally. He grows maize and nuts on the family-owned land, as well. Part of the harvested products are sold, and the rest is used for family needs. 

Besides his agricultural activities, Dato works as an auto mechanic to earn monthly income. He requested a loan to purchase building materials, so he will be able to build a motor garage. After the building is built, Dato will be able to serve the local drivers, regardless of the weather conditions. He will be able to increase the family's income and improve the living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to build a garage and serve the local drivers as a mechanic.

loans.name: San Miguel Kuña Renda Group

texts.es:
El Comité San Miguel Kuña Renda, se formo en la Ciudad de Caaguazú, se formaron como comité a través de promociones. Ellas decidieron formar un grupo solidario, donde trabajan en equipo donde la  responsabilidad  es un factor muy importante y cada una posee un trabajo independiente.
La Presidenta del Grupo es la Sra. Alice, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras por la zonas de Caaguazú con la ayuda de sus hijos todos trabajan ya que así se apoyan laboralmente para tratar de tener una vida digna. Es una señora muy activa y responsable y quiere seguir trabajando por sus hijos y así que tengan todo lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de frutas y de verduras, con los cuales podrá tener buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee named “San Miguel Kuña Renda” was established in the city of Caaguazú as a result of a promotional event. The members decided to form a solidarity group in which they could work responsibly as a team. This is an important factor for the group, yet each member has her own independent business.

Sra. Alice is the group president. She sells fruits and vegetables in the various neighborhoods of Caaguazú with the help of her children. All of them help out with the work so that they can have a decent life. Alice is an active and responsible woman who continues to work on behalf of her children so that they can have everything they need.

Alice is requesting a loan so that she can buy fruits and vegetables. This will enable her to have a wide variety of products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Por Fe Group

texts.es:
Johanna Cortes  una socia de Banco Mujer Por Fe,  con mucha visión empresarial  y ganas de superarse, tiene 30 años de edad, es  casada, y  madre de una adolescente de 14 años, estudiante de secundaria. Su esposo trabaja como oficial de seguridad y ella trabaja como empleada domestica medio tiempo, y el otro medio tiempo se dedica a actividades comerciales como venta de zapatos y sandalias para mujer y niña.  Esta doble jornada de trabajo de Doña Johanna es la manera de ayudar a su familia, y darle los estudios a su única hija. Este es su tercer crédito y va invertir en mercadería para la temporada navideña.
El crédito va ser de gran ayuda para su negocio y representa  una oportunidad de incrementar sus ventas, así como aumentar su cartera de clientes.
Su mayor deseo es mejorar la situación económica de su familia y a la vez  su calidad de vida. 
Junto a Johanna están; Alba y Celia, sus compañeras de operación de crédito que va a invertir en actividades comerciales y de pequeña industria.
texts.en:
Johanna Cortes, a member of the Women's Bank "Por Fe" with a great business vision and the will to succeed, is 30 years old and married and the mother of a 14 year old teenager who is in high school.  Her husband works as a security guard and she works as a domestic part-time.  The other part of her time, she does other commercial activities, like selling shoes and sandals for women and children.  This two-part day of work is the way that Johanna helps her family and gives her child the ability to go to school.  This is her third loan, and she plans to invest in merchandise for the Christmas season.

This loan will be a big help to her business and represents an opportunity to increase her sales as well as her customer base.  Her greatest hope is to improve her family's financial situation and their quality of life.  Together with Johanna are Alba and Celia, her companions in this loan operation, who are going to invest in business activities and small-scale industry.

loans.use: to buy shoes and sandals for women and young girls.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en:
Ms Nusrat is a 45-year-old, married woman, and a mother of five. Twelve years ago she started her own business, a beauty parlor, at the corner of her house. She did this because her husband’s income was not sufficient to meet everyday expenditures of the family members. She is a very hard-working lady; people living in her community prefer to come to her parlor, because she provides the best services.
 
However, due to insufficient cash in hand she is unable to meet the requirements of the parlor. For this, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs. 30,000. She will use the loan to purchase more products for hair treatment and skin care, and utensils like rollers and dryers. With the help of this loan, she will be catering to more customers at a time, which will ultimately improve her earnings. She shared her dream of expanding her beauty parlor by providing additional facilities, including gym and fitness, to her customers.

loans.use: To purchase more products for hair treatment and skin care, and utensils like rollers and dryers.

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
El comité San Juan tiene 11 integrantes, todas son mujeres trabajadoras y humilde, cada una cuentan con sus actividades y se esfuerzan por salir adelante y luchar por sus familias. Todas son mujeres indígenas y  tiene ganas de trabajar y así empezaron a trabajar en comités.
Julia una de las miembros hace crochet, hace todo tipo de novedades, como ser prendas, sobrecamas, manteles y demás. Es muy emprendedora y siempre hace trabajos innovadores que atrae a sus clientes.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de hilos y agujas para poder seguir trabajando y mejorando su trabajo.
texts.en:
The committee named “San Juan” has 11 members. All of them are hardworking and humble women. Each one has her own business and they all strive to move forward on behalf of their families. All of the members are indigenous women who have the desire to work, which is why they established this committee.

Julia is a group member who does crochet work. She creates new designs of all types including clothing, quilts, tablecloths, and other items. Julia is very enterprising and always does innovative work that is attractive to her customers.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy yarn and needles so that she can continue working and improving her craft.

loans.use: to buy yarn and needles.

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es: ¡HOLA!, El grupo que observamos en la foto es de “MUJERES ACTIVAS”, esta asociación ya tiene más de 10 años y actualmente lo integran 6 socias muy emprendedoras y dinámicas (La Sra. Sofía no pudo asistir el día del desembolso del préstamo por motivos de salud). Una de ellas es la Sra. Jacinta (Es la que viste un polo manga larga azul con aplicativos dorados), quien es la tesorera del grupo y la persona de mayor confianza. Jacinta tiene 52 años, tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad y 2 bajo su tutela. Ella es una comerciante que posee una bodega, con el cual genera ingresos a su familia. El presente préstamo es para comprar mercadería por campaña navideña y así poder ofrecer variedad en sus productos; Aparte de esta actividad también alquila parte de su vivienda, el cual le genera un ingreso extra mensualmente. Las integrantes de “MUJERES ACTIVAS” y en especial Jacinta se despiden y agradecen a todas las personas que apoyan a la causa.
texts.en:
Hello!  The group in the photo is from “MUJERES ACTIVAS,” an association that has already been in existence for more than 10 years and currently has 6 very enterprising and dynamic members (Mrs. Sofía is not able to attend the day of the loan disbursement due to health reasons). 

One of the women is Mrs. Jacinta (the woman in the photo wearing the long-sleeved blue polo with golden applique).  Jacinta is the group’s treasurer and a very reliable person. She is 52 years old and has 2 adult children and 2 children under her guardianship. Jacinta is a merchant who has her own store, which is how she generates income for her family. The present loan is to buy merchandise for the Christmas season to be able to offer variety in her products. Aside from this activity, she also rents part of her home, which generates extra monthly income for her. 

The members of “MUJERES ACTIVAS,” especially Jacinta, say goodbye and thank you to all the people that support their cause.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for the Christmas season

loans.name: Roseline

texts.en:
Roseline is 35 years old, married, and has three children. She has been in business for five years and describes her business as being profitable. She is very hardworking and she has been able to enlarge her business thanks to Faulu Kenya for the financial support they have given her. 

She hopes to expand her business more and have more profits. She requests a loan of 21,363.75 KES to increase her stock of basins, trays, plates and cups.

loans.use: to increase her stock of  basins, trays, plates and cups

loans.name: Hana

texts.en:
Hana is 46 years old, a businesswoman who owns a retail shop where she sells vehicle spare parts. She is married and has four children who are all in school. She is very hardworking and has been in this business for twenty years. Faulu Kenya has helped her learn to be very independent. 

She hopes to open another shop and to be able to support her children. In order to boost her business she requires a loan of 63,078.75 KES to buy springs, seat belts and oil.

loans.use: to buy springs, seat belts, and oil

loans.name: Maria Lucy

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de panaderia,la socia elabora diferentes tipos de pan y luego los vende en el mercado,al socia tarbaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los panes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar harina,mantequilla y huevos al por mayor.

La socia está muy agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho préstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
María Lucy continues to work as a baker. She makes different kinds of bread and then sells them in the market. She works from 8:00am until 7:00pm. She has been in this business for 6 years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell her bread. She is requesting the loan to buy flour, butter, and eggs at wholesale price.

She is very grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy flour, butter, and eggs at wholesale price.

loans.name: Chela

texts.es:
La socia Chela tiene 42 años de edad y se dedica a este negocio de venta de cerveza,la socia tiene un deposito donde vende cerveza,la socia trabaja deswde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de cerveza.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cerveza al por mayor.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su cuota.
texts.en:
Chela is 42 years old and she has a business selling beer. She has a store where she sells beer. She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm. She has had this business for 7 years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her beer business. She is requesting the loan to buy beer at wholesale price.

She is very happy with the loan she has been granted and pledges to make her repayments.

loans.use: to buy beer at wholesale price.

loans.name: Nzara

texts.en:
Nzara is a very enterprising woman whose greatest wish is to provide a better future for her family; she wants to have new horizons and forget about crime. She strives daily for her family group. She’s very hardworking and has been operating a cafe, selling basic African dishes and snacks.

She’s been in business for several years and is proud because she’s attained good results. She’s very well-known and has a large clientele that prefers her for the quality, prices and good service. With this income she’s able to provide her home with daily bread and see that nothing is lacking at home. 

Nzara is convinced that if production increases so will sales and this is why she approached Yehu to request a loan to buy wheat flour, meat, vegetables, cooking oil, etc.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, meat, vegetables, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and embroidery materials for sewing and embroidery business

loans.name: Dwighta

texts.en:
This is Dwighta. She previously accepted a 30,000 PHP loan that she used to buy more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. She is also a mineral water distributor. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Dwighta hopes to have a good life through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.
 
* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy varieties of fish to resell

loans.name: Parmen

texts.en:
Parmen is 37 years old. He lives in Abasha, West Georgia, with his wife and his mother, who is a pensioner. Parmen works as an artisan in his village and gets a monthly income. The family runs a dairy business. In particular, they have 2 milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese production. They sell approximately 40 kg cheese locally in an open market at a good price. Each member of the family works hard to insure a good harvest. 

Parmen requested a loan for his wife to buy clothing for resale. His wife plans to purchase clothing from wholesalers and sell it among their villagers as well as in the nearby villages. That will increase the income of the family. With increased income they will improve their living conditions. Parmen and his wife are awaiting your support.

loans.use: to purchase clothing from wholesalers for his wife to sell among the villagers

loans.name: Gocha

texts.en:
Gocha is from Samtredia district of West Georgia. He is 44 years old and lives with his wife, 15-year-old son, and a sister. His sister has a chronic health problem and gets a relevant pension from the local government. The family earns their living through agricultural work. In particular, they have a plot of land where nuts are grown. The family does all relevant agricultural work to ensure a good quality of harvest.  

Besides that, Gocha runs a small dairy farm of two calves and two milk cow and sells approximately 40 kg of cheese per month. Gocha has his own tractor as well and serves the local farmers. He gets a service fee. 

Gocha requested a loan to purchase tires for his tractor and repair it. After the tires are changed and the tractor is repaired, Gocha will continue working intensively. This will increase his income and Gocha will be able to make some savings for house renovation. Gocha awaits your support.

loans.use: to change the tires on his tractor

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es:
El comité Nueva Vida, se conformo con la iniciativa de una de las miembros, actualmente se encuentran  en el tercer  ciclo, con once  integrantes. Este comité ha demostrado unión y solidaridad entre las compañeras; quienes poseen actividad  económica y son muy trabajadoras.
Catalina, miembro de este grupo tiene una despensa en su casa, y gracias a este negocio su familia está teniendo como solventar su día a día. La meta de Catalina es seguir trabajando y agrandando su negocio.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de bebida, comestibles, enlatados y productos a granel.
texts.en:
The Nueva Vida committee, formed with the initiative of one of its members, is currently in its third cycle, with eleven members. This committee has demonstrated unity and solidarity among its partners, who possess economic activity and are very hard-working.

Catalina, a member of this group, has a store in her house.  Thanks to this business, her family has a way to meet their daily needs. Catalina’s goal is to continue working and growing her business.

Catalina is requesting this loan to buy drinks, food, canned goods and bulk products.

loans.use: to buy drinks, food, canned goods and bulk products.

loans.name: Abdukunduz

texts.ru: Абдукундузу 56 лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Он всегда старается обеспечить свою семью со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Более 11  лет он занимается скотоводством. Он продает молоко своим соседям и соседи очень довольны от полученного натурального молочного продукта. Еще он продает скот, за которым он присматривался в течение нескольких месяцев. На рынке у него много клиентов. Абдукундуз хочет развивать свой бизнес, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  1500  сомони для покупки скота, чтобы развевать бизнес. Он обещает погасить займ своевременно. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Abdukunduz is 56 years old, married, and has 3 children in his care. He constantly tries to provide his family with all necessities of life. For over 11 years, Abdukunduz has been engaged in animal husbandry. He sells milk to his neighbours, who are very glad to receive his natural dairy products. Additionally, Abdukunduz sells livestock after raising it for several months, and has many customers at the market.

Abdukunduz would like to develop his business but lacks the necessary funds. He is requesting a loan of 1500 somoni to purchase cattle and expand his operation. He promises to repay the loan on time. 

Abdukunduz is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Monica

texts.es:
La socia Monica se dedica al negocio de panaderia,ella prepara diferentes tipos de pan y luego los vende en las diferentes mercados,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,la socia por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de panaderia.La socia solicita le credito para comprar insumos para preparar pan como harina,mantequilla y harina.

La socia esta feliz con el prestamo otorgado y se compromete a pagar ssu cuotas.
texts.en:
Monica has a bakery business where she makes different kinds of breads and then sells them at various markets. She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm. She has been in this business for 5 years and it is going very well for her. It is through this business that she hopes to get ahead. Her dream is to expand her bakery. She is requesting the loan to buy ingredients for making bread, such as flour and butter.

She is very happy with the loan she's been granted and pledges to make her repayments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making bread, such as flour and butter.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La Sr Carmen es una persona dotada con muchos valores como la sinceridad, honestidad y las personas la conocen como una persona amigable y con mucha fuerza para el trabajo, ganandose asi el respeto de sus vecinos y el de su familia.

El Prestamo solicitado a Fodemi es para incrementar su pequeño negocio y comprar tela en gran cantidad, para la confeccion de ropa, ya que se acerca la temporada de navidad y es una buena oportunidad para vender mas y asi seguir creciendo economicamente y para poder ayudar a sus hijos.

El sueño que Sr. carmen tiene es tener su propio taller de confeccion de ropa, con maquinas industriales, donde ella misma confeccione y pueda vender su trabajo, y asi poder incrementar su ingresos para sacar adelante a sus hijos y brindarles una buena educacion.
texts.en:
Sra. Carmen is an individual who possesses many values, such as sincerity and honesty. Those who know her say that she is a friendly person and works very hard at her job. As a result, she has gained the respect of her neighbors and family members.

The loan she is requesting from FODEMI will be used to expand her small business by enabling her to purchase fabric in large quantities so that she can produce clothing. With the Christmas season approaching, she will have a good opportunity to sell more and continue growing financially so that she can help her children.

Sra. Carmen’s dream is to have her own sewing workshop where she can produce clothes with the aid of industrial machines. She would be able to sell what she produces in the same place, thus allowing her to increase her earnings so that she can help her children move forward and provide them a good education.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Ms. Samina is a 21-year-old unmarried woman. Eight years ago, after the death of her father, she started her own beauty parlor business at the corner of her house. She is very passionate about her work and earns enough income to support her family members. Through providing excellent services she has become very famous in her street. 

As her customers' demand is increasing day by day, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the beauty parlor. But due to low cash in hand,  she contacted Kashf Foundation and requested a loan of Rs 20,000 to buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities. 

Samina is hopeful to get an increase in her net income by satisfying the demand of her customers at the right time. With the help of the loan, she will not only purchase a variety of products but will also able to meet her household expenditures.

loans.use: To buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities.

loans.name: Ladu Alfos

texts.en:
Ladu is a 32-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 11. All of them go to school. Ladu   runs a general store and has been in business for three years. He has no employees. He heard about Finance Sudan through promotions by the loan officers. He is taking a loan of 3500  sdg to purchase more cooking oil and many other items.  In addition to this business, he has no other source of income.

In 5 years Ladu   would like to expand his business and open other branches. His   major challenges include high market prices. Ladu says he is happy about the loans given by Finance Sudan through the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more items like cooking oil, washing soap, tea leaves, etc.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité "San Cayetano" tiene el objetivo de cada de una de ellas es trabajen, fomenten el espíritu solidario y llegar al nivel máximo del programa por medio del esfuerzo de todas juntas.
La Sra. Luisa, es Presidenta del grupo, ella elabora panecillos y diversas clases de masas dulces y vende por el barrio. Su deseo es progresar con la Fundación y su grupo y que su comité se vaya fortaleciendo cada día más. Ella pondrá el mayor de su esfuerzo para que su comité surja  y salga adelante, así podrá ejecutar su idea y plan de trabajo.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de harina, azúcar, dulce de leche, coco y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo las masas dulces que ella hace.
texts.en:
The goal of the committee named “San Cayetano” is for each of its members to work and promote a spirit of solidarity so that they can reach the highest level in the program. They hope to achieve this goal by working together.

Sra. Luisa, the group president, makes different types of breads and pastries and sells them in the neighborhood. Her wish is to make progress with Fundación Paraguaya and her group so that her committee gets stronger each day. She invests most of her effort into seeing that her committee emerges as a successful group. Therefore, she plans to execute her ideas and follow through with her work plan.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy flour, sugar, sweetened milk, coconut, and other supplies that she needs to continue making pastries.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, sweetened milk, coconut, and other supplies.

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es:
Nuevo horizonte está en su ciclo numero 17, es un grupo  muy trabajador y manifiestan que las capacitaciones que reciben les ha sido de mucha ayuda y que están creciendo bastante.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Fátima, ella trabaja de empleada domestica y también se dedica a la venta de mercaderías comestibles, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y se esfuerza por salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida y ayudar a sus familiares.
Cuenta la Sra. Fátima  que el crédito lo utilizará para la compra de comestibles  para volver a vender,  ella se encuentra  muy agradecida ya que gracias a esta ayuda podrá mejorar sus ingresos y el de su familia.
texts.en:
Nuevo Horizonte (New Horizon) is in its 17th cycle.  It is a very hard-working group.  They state that the training they receive has been a great help to them and they have been growing quite a lot.

One of the group’s members is Ms. Fátima.  She works as a maid and also sells food merchandise.  She is a very hard-working person.  She is struggling to get ahead and be someone in life and to help her relatives.

Ms. Fátima says that the loan will be used to buy food to re-sell.  She is very grateful, since thanks to this help, she will be able to improve her income and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy food to sell.

loans.name: Ahmatjon

texts.ru: Человек с огромным сердцем доброты и прекрасной душой, который живет среди высоких Таджикских гор, нуждается вашей поддержки, так как последние время у него проблемы с финансами. Его зовут Ахматчон.  Ему 56 лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Климат его местожительство весьма благополучный для выращивания сельхоз культур, а также для скотоводства. Более 10  лет он занимается скотоводством. Он продает скот, за которым он присматривался в течение нескольких месяцев. На рынке у него много клиентов. Он хочет развивать свой бизнес, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает займ на сумму   4000 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы развевать бизнес. С полученного  дохода он собирается обеспечить своих детей современными технологиями. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
A man with a big kind heart and a beautiful soul, who lives among the high Tajik mountains, needs your help due to recent financial problems. His name is Ahmatjon. He is 56 years old, married, and has 3 children in his care. His home's climate is very favourable for agriculture and animal farming. For over 10 years, Ahmatjon has been raising cattle. He sells animals after tending to then for several months, and has many customers at the market.

Ahmatjon would like to develop his business but lacks the necessary funds. He is requesting a loan of 4000 somoni to purchase cattle and expand his enterprise. He plans to use his profits to provide his children with access to modern technologies. Ahmatjon is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Kherdija

texts.en: Kherdija is a 45-year-old married woman. She has three children whose ages range from 9 to 15 years old. She describes herself as a hardworking and active woman. She operates a food stall where she sells foods such as chapati. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located within a busy area and her primary customers are local residents. She says her biggest business challenge is stiff competition within the area. Kherdija will use this 40,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy food ingredients for preparing meals to sell. Her goal is to expand her business within 5 years. She hopes that she will run another similar food stall outlet in the future. This is her first loan with SMEP Deposit Taking Microfinance.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing food to sell.

loans.name: Sofronias

texts.en:
Sofronias is a 52-year-old married man and a father of one child from San Miguel, Bohol. He buys and sells vegetables and other produce and sells them in the market.

Sofronias wants to expand his business but lacks the financial resources to do so. He is asking for a loan to buy more vegetables and fruits to sell in the market. In the future, Sofronias hopes to make his business successful and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and fruits to sell in the market.

loans.name: Baasanjav

texts.en:
Mr. Baasanjav is 57 years old and lives with his wife and daughter in Hovd province of Mongolia. His wife Givaahuu has been working at a local market. His daughter Monhmart is a freshman at university. He has been operating a spare parts retail business since 2002 at a local market. He already has gained lot of experience and regular customers over the years. His older children got married and moved out of their parents' house. 

Mr. Baasanjav is a hardworking, diligent man who says, "My only goal is to educate my youngest daughter and let her marry a good guy." He is now requesting 4,000,000 MNT to pay his daughter's tuition and dormitory expenses in the capital city.

loans.use: To pay his daughter's tuition and dormitory expenses

loans.name: Guilma

texts.es:
Guilma de  34 años natural de Santa Rosa, lleva una vida independiente al lado de su familia conformada por sus padres y hermanos, es poseedora de una vivienda construida con bloques de adobe. 
Se dedica a la producción de cacao orgánico en distintas parcelas que renta para producción por temporadas, asimismo lleva más de 1 año destinando parte de su capital para la contrata de jornaleros quienes son un firme apoyo en el trabajo forzoso del campo.
Le agrada trabajar con los productos agropecuarios ya que son bien cotizados por los acopiadores pues a pesar de laborar en parcelas rentadas terminan generándole buenas ganancias para ella y su familia, aunque en ocasiones la lluvia y los cambios bruscos de clima obligan a detener sus actividades perjudicándola de manera considerable. Como todo agricultor necesita de capital inicial suficiente para cubrir la temporada entera de mantenimiento hasta la cosecha, secado y comercializado del mismo. Dentro de su lista de requerimientos debe contar con sacos de abono orgánico y destinar dinero para el pago adelantado de los jornaleros.
Espera seguir trabajando con el mismo impulso para lograr así a futuro adquirir su propia parcela y seguir desempeñándose en el rubro. Este viene a ser su primer crédito con MFP, agradece desde ya por la confianza brindada y se compromete a ser una socia puntual. Se siente muy cómoda por la manera en como se desarrolla su grupo comunal ya motivan al trabajo en equipo.
Con los 500 nuevos soles complementara su capital de trabajo destinado para la compra de insumos como abono orgánico así como contratar jornaleros.
texts.en:
Guilma is 34 years old and is from Santa Rosa. She leads an independent life alongside her family, which is made up of her parents and her siblings. She owns a house built of adobe blocks.

She grows organic cacao on several parcels that she rents for seasonal production. For the past year she has also been dedicating part of her capital to hiring laborers, who are a big help with the hard work in the fields.
